page.title: 17A BETTER VILLAGE--M.WILSON
page.content: AROUND WEST HALLAM WE NEED A HOSPITAL BECAUSE YOU HAVE TO GO TO ILKESTON AND IT IS EXPENSIVE AND TIME-COSUMING.I ALSO THINK THAT WE SHOULD HAVE MORE SHOPS BECAUSE WE ONLY HAVE TWO POST OFFICES,ONE BAKERY AND CRESSWELLS THE SUPERMARKET.A CAR PARK IS NEEDED NEXT TO THE CRICKET AS THERE IS NOT ENOUGH SPACE FOR ALL THE CARS.I THINK THAT DAMAGED ROADS SHOULD BE REPAIRED AS THERE ARE DANGEROUS POT-HOLES THAT SHOULD BE FILLED IN WITH TARMAC OR GRAVEL.I WOULD LIKE A SWIMMING POOL TO BE OPPOSITE THE POST-OFFICE,WHICH IS BUILT IN STONE SIMILAR TO THE OLD VILLAGE HOUSE.
